local_intent: Execute a push along the cloth edge (0.1m at 180°) after confirming visibility and yaw alignment with an open gripper, then wait briefly and verify visibility.
assumptions: Robot is already near the cloth edge with contact established or sufficient proximity for pushing
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer phase: ensures cloth visibility, aligns yaw to 90°, keeps gripper open, performs the push with specified distance and direction, waits for settling, and verifies visibility.
